title: Wolf Among Wolves (TV series)
text: Wolf Among Wolves (German:Wolf unter Wölfen) is a 1965 East German television series, based on the 1938 novel "<a href="Wolf%20Among%20Wolves">Wolf Among Wolves</a>" by <a href="Hans%20Fallada">Hans Fallada</a>. It was aired in four parts on <a href="Deutscher%20Fernsehfunk">DFF</a>. The series portrays life in the 1920s <a href="Berlin">Berlin</a> of the <a href="Weimar%20Republic">Weimar Republic</a>. It was the first East German television series to air in <a href="West%20Germany">West Germany</a>.
